title: Building Responsive UIs
subTitle: Focus on designing and building user interfaces that adapt well across devices.
firstText: I build layouts that look and feel great on mobile, tablet, and desktop.
secText: I use Tailwind CSS and responsive design principles to ensure accessibility and fluidity.
thirdText: I pay attention to spacing, alignment, and visual hierarchy for a clean UI.

title: Turn Designs Into Code
subTitle: I take mockups or ideas and transform them into functional web experiences.
firstText: I bring Figma or design mockups to life with pixel-perfect accuracy.
secText: I work mainly with React to turn static designs into dynamic, interactive components.
thirdText: I ensure that the code I write is clean, reusable, and easy to maintain.

title: Teamwork & Growth
subTitle: I'm not just coding in isolation — but learning, communicating, and working with others
firstText: I constantly explore new tools, libraries, and best practices to improve my craft.
secText: I'm comfortable working in teams, receiving feedback, and adapting quickly.
thirdText: I’m passionate about building meaningful projects and sharing what I learn along the way.
